message.content:
cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.DB, cs.LG 

The paper deals with the problem of document redaction and sanitization, which is a crucial aspect of data privacy. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The paper proposes a privacy model that uses data semantics and information theory to develop automated redaction/sanitization tools, which suggests that it could also fit into the categories of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval). The paper also mentions the need for appropriate data protection measures, which could place it in the category of cs.DB (Databases). Finally, the paper proposes a model that provides privacy guarantees, which could make it relevant to the category of cs.LG (Machine Learning).
